name: Midnight's Dangers
description:
Global Game Jam 2019

https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/midnights-dangers

Midnight's Dangers is a 2D game in which one you need to defend your home using a precious sword because when darkness is falling some creature want to destroy your home, hopefully they can't survive under light.

You must survive ten days to kill them all.

Control :

Move: AD - left/right arrow - left joystick
Jump: Space - num 0 - joystick a
Attack: E - num 2 - left mouse - joystick b
